dict.string: An Alfred workflow for DeepSeek chat.
Optionally add a line of text which will be prepended to the input
↩ Ask question · ⌘↩ New chat · ⌥↩ Copy last · ⌃↩ Copy all · ⇧↩ Interrupt
↩ Continue chat · ⌘↩ New chat · ⌥↩ Chat history

## Setup
1. Create a DeepSeek account and get your API key 2. Add your API key to the [Workflow's Configuration](https://www.alfredapp.com/help/workflows/user-configuration/)
## Usage
Query DeepSeek via the `deepseek` keyword
View Chat History with ⌥↩ in the `deepseek` keyword. Each result shows the first question as the title and the last as the subtitle.
Save current chat when starting a new one
Enter model name like deepseek-chat, deepseek-reasoner, or other available DeepSeek models
How many older questions and answers to send.
Initial message to guide DeepSeek on the answers you expect.
